Question
========

From a randomly drawn sample of 5 women, the (normally distributed) weight (in kg.) was measured:‖ 55, 70, 61, 58, 66\ We want to test H~0~: μ=60. What is the result of the test magnitude?

Answerlist
----------

* 0.33
* 0.74
* 1.66
* 1.7

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.33: Incorrect
* 0.74: Correct
* 1.66: Incorrect
* 1.7: Incorrect
